import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid} from '@material-ui/core' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import Posts from './components/Posts/posts' import Form from './components/Form/form' import useStyles from './styles' import {getPosts} from './actions/posts' import memories from './images/memories.png' const App = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [dispatch]) return ( Memories
) } export default App
